mapper.select: SELECT PL.POINT_ID AS pointId, PL.OBJECT_CD AS objectId, PL.PRIMITIVE_TYPE_CD AS primitiveType, PL.PRIORITY_CD AS priority, AM.AGENT_PROTOCOL_CD AS agentProtocol, AD.PRIVATE_IP AS privateIp FROM POIT_LIST AS PL JOIN AGNT_MASTER AS AM ON (AM.BUID_MASTER_IX = ${buidMasterIx} AND AM.AGNT_MASTER_IX = ${agentMasterIx}) JOIN AGNT_DDC AS AD ON (AD.AGNT_MASTER_IX = AM.AGNT_MASTER_IX AND AD.AGNT_DDC_IX = PL.AGNT_DDC_IX)
